snippet: Before he ordered Kim Davis to jail for refusing to issue gay marriage licenses, David L. Bunning first drew attention as a federal judge for a ruling on gay rights.
abstract: Federal Judge David L Bunning, who jailed Rowan County clerk Kim Davis for refusing marriage licenses for same-sex couples, has history of rulings in favor of gay rights and other progressive causes in Kentucky.
lead_paragraph: Before he ordered Kim Davis to jail for refusing to issue gay marriage licenses, David L. Bunning first drew attention as a federal judge for a ruling on gay rights.

headline.main: Judge Who Jailed Kentucky Clerk Is No Stranger to Controversy
headline.print_headline: Contentious Case Over Gay Rights Nothing New to a Kentucky Judge

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
